__TOC__

BarryWalker has been an advocate of Ubuntu since seeing a presentation about the plan for Warty given at South Birmingham LUG. He signed up to be a beta tester and had hours of fun pestering the team to get wifi working on his Packard Bell notebook :)

He has been a very keen supporter of Open Source since first finding Linux eight years ago. 

He lives in Birmingham, England where he is learning to program in Python and runs his own website from a cupbord  url; <nowiki>[[http://walkertopia.com]]</nowiki>
